titleStmt.title: A letter to the States General of the United Provinces from Prince Waldeck, who commands their army in Flanders, giving an account of the happy success they had against the French army commanded by the Mareschal d'Humieres, on the 15/25 of August instant, 1689 ; published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Waldeck, Georg Friedrich, Graf von, 1620-1692.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.
